resources.string: This is a game for two or more players wherein the players take turn in rolling a six sided dice.
1. Player rolls a number, then puts a penny into the machine slot index corresponding to the number the player just rolled.
2. If the slots is a 6, the penny falls through the board and the player is out of the game.
3. If a player roll the dice and the machine slot is already filled with the value, the player takes all the pennies on the board and player passes unto the next player.
4. Players must roll at least once but can decide to pass his/her turn to the next player.
5. The First player to get rid of all the pennies if the winner.
Now that you know the rules, make the game winnable for yourself by maximizing wining, GOOD LUCK amigos!
